Package com.noctarius.borabora

This package contains the main public API to interact with borabora.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Dictionary
    A dictionary is a map of key-value data items.
    Input  
    Output  
    Parser
    The Parser class is the entry point for all parsing related activities.
    Query  
    Sequence
    A sequence is a list of value data items.
    Value  
    ValueType
    Implementations of this interface represent value types to further specify over a MajorType definition.
    Writer  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HalfPrecisionFloat  
    Predicates  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MajorType
    The MajorType enum defines the basic types as specified by the CBOR specification (RFC 7049).
    ValuePrettyPrinter  
    ValueTypes
    ValueTypes are a set of prebuilt ValueType implementations.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NoSuchByteException  
    QueryParserException
    This exception type is thrown for any kind of parsing exception, while parsing a query language string.
    WrongTypeException
    This exception is commonly thrown on occasions where a wrong type is assumed by a query.

Package com.noctarius.borabora Description

This package contains the main public API to interact with borabora. This includes parser classes and value extractions, writers and all io related public APIs.
